results.name: a(n) = A046523(A332461(n)), where A332461(n) = Product_{d|n, d>1} prime(1+A297167(d))).
link: Antti Karttunen, Table of n, a(n) for n = 1..8192
Index entries for sequences computed from indices in prime factorization
program: A046523(n) = { my(f=vecsort(factor(n)[, 2], , 4), p); prod(i=1, #f, (p=nextprime(p+1))^f[i]); };  \\ From A046523
results.author: _Antti Karttunen_, Feb 19 2019
